miic3.utils.datatype.save¶

miic3.utils.datatype.save(filename, **kwargs)[source]¶

Save objects of classes in this module to a numpy npz file

Parameters

  • filename (str) – path to save the file

  • kwargs (keyword arguments) – ´name=variable` pair containing the variables to save
